Pre-Game Insights: The Cleveland Guardians got off to a good start in Game 1 of this set, posting a 5-2 win. In the Tuesday matchup, New York was up 3-0 after just two innings and ended up with another victory 6-3. In Game 3 Thursday, the Yankees came back from a 3-1 deficit but ultimately ended up losing 7-5 in 10 innings.
Others: This will be Game 4 in a best-of-seven ALCS series. The starting pitchers for Game 4 will be New York’s Luis Gil and Cleveland’s Gavin Williams.
